contents.title: List Adjustment
contents.item: Regarding the recent significant changes in difficulty levels, the songs for level 13 have been rearranged and finalized. There will be a temporary missing of some songs for levels 11 and 12, and updates will be promptly made after the discussion group has finalized their decisions. [MEGA] Assassin 14.5 → 14.6. [GIGA] 涅槃を灯すシヤ一デソフロイデ 14.3 → 14.2. [GIGA] Acrise 14.2 → 14.3. [GIGA] Glacial (Liquart Remix) 14.0 → 14.0.

contents.title: Added
contents.item: Added a new feature for downloading screenshots for each difficulty level. The newly added 'Issues Report' button is now available for submitting any problems or bugs you encounter. By utilizing this button, you can quickly and easily report any issues you have with our product or service, allowing our team to promptly address and resolve them.

contents.title: Fixed
contents.item: Fixed the issue of mismatch between the cover and song titles for some tracks. Fixed the issue where periods were not displaying properly on the  CHANGELOG page. Corrected typos in the CHANGELOG page.

contents.title: List Adjustment
contents.item: Regarding the recent significant changes in difficulty levels, the songs for levels 14 and 15 have been rearranged and finalized. There will be a temporary missing of some songs for levels 11 to 13, and updates will be promptly made after the discussion group has finalized their decisions.

contents.title: Added
contents.item: A CHANGELOG page has been added. Our group chat QR code has been added to footnotes.

contents.title: Fixed
contents.item: Significantly optimized performance across the website.

contents.title: Changed
contents.item: Optimized UI. The entire codebase has undergone a complete rewrite.

contents.title: List Adjustment
contents.item: [GIGA] haptime 14.5 → 14.3~14.8. [MEGA] Love Like We're Dying 13.2 → 13.1. [HARD] 終の舞姫 12.2 → 12.3. [MEGA] Tronica and Fugue 12.1 → 12.2. [HARD] haptime 11.7 → 11.6~11.9. [MEGA] Phoenixismia 11.5 → 11.5.

contents.title: Fixed
contents.item: Significantly optimized performance across the website.

contents.title: Changed
contents.item: Using IME to search for songs will not trigger songs filtering. Performed major code refactorings and improvements. Made subtle visual enhancements to improve the overall aesthetic and user experience.

contents.title: Fixed
contents.item: Resolved issue where pages could not be accessed before content fully loaded.

contents.title: Fixed
contents.item: Fixed delayed content loading after clicking welcome page. Fixed number bars display disappearing after clicking difficulty button. Fixed footer positioned wrong for few search results. Refreshing the page now correctly returns to the top of the page. Significantly optimized performance across the website.

contents.title: Changed
contents.item: Added animations when navigating to pages via click. Reordered Participants alphabetically. Optimized some code.

contents.title: Added
contents.item: Added `CHANGELOG.md` to track changes in the project.

contents.title: Fixed
contents.item: Fixed jerking images when the mouse pointer is over the last song in each row. Fixed number bars disappearing when refreshing the page. Resolved content overlaps caused by attaching number bars for charts with personal differences to the top of the page. Corrected footer position issue during search box usage.

contents.title: Added
contents.item: Initial release of Dynamix Rank List Beta.
